title: CareerCanvas – A Career Growth Platform
description: A personalized career guidance platform for users aged 15–35 to explore job roles, map career routes, log experiences, and track progress with goal-based modules.
highlight: Crafted an end-to-end, user-first system that adapts to students, job seekers, and professionals alike.

title: Full-Stack Luggage Booking Web App
description: A production-ready luggage delivery platform with real-time address selection, dynamic pricing, Stripe payments, and session-tracked orders.
highlight: Built a seamless booking flow with secure payments, real-time address selection, and responsive UI — all optimized for real-world use.

title: UX Research: Tech Support for Older Adults
description: Studied how older adults prefer and interact with video-based tech support.
highlight: Merged design empathy with real user needs — identifying pain points and usability gaps.

title: Distributed Object Store with Integrity
description: Simulated a fault-tolerant distributed storage system using Docker and erasure coding.
highlight: Built the integrity-checking system and ran client simulations to test node failure recovery.

title: Sweet Home Finder
description: A web app matching pet adopters with shelters based on preferences.
highlight: Built full-stack features like login, CRUD tools, admin dashboards, and live chat between users.

title: HabiTrack – Habit Tracker with Motivation
description: An intuitive habit tracker with reminders, milestone animations, and behavior modeling (Fogg’s Model).
highlight: Conducted user testing, built dashboards, and focused heavily on visual motivation.

title: MediCARE App for Parkinson’s Detection
description: Award-winning project combining voice and handwriting data to detect Parkinson’s with 91.3%+ accuracy.
highlight: Led the development, presented at an international conference, and won “Best Project Presentation.”
